No minors. There are some jurisdictions where material posted by non-adults falls under some very strict legal constraints. I want no part of that, so if you are under 18 then sorry, please look for another server.

rules.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin@stellar.build
Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.
Do not tone police. Even if someone else violates the CoC, it is not your responsibility to moderate them or criticize them for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them.

instance.shortDescription: Esta es una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, explícitas e implícitas.
instance.description: Esta es una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, explícitas e implícitas.

contactAccount.note: Administro Paquita, una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, explícitas e implícitas.

fields.name: Donaciones
fields.value: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=82580186

rules.text: Respeta la identidad propia, las experiencias y la personalidad de los demás. Todos los tipos de personalidad son bienvenidos aquí, siempre que respeten y no dañen a los demás. Al mismo tiempo, ten en cuenta que los demás pueden cometer errores o utilizar una terminología diferente a la tuya.

Racismo, machismo, capacitismo, homofobia, transfobia, queerfobia, xenofobia, antisemitismo, islamofobia y supremacismo blanco suponen bloqueo inmediato y, en caso de que los administradores consideren que esta conducta puede ser delictiva, una denuncia inmediata a las autoridades.

Se bloqueará inmediatamente a toda persona o dominio que implícita o explícitamente difunda retórica fascista, nazi, franquista, de extrema derecha y otras formas de nacionalismo violento o excluyente. En caso de detectar un posible delito de odio los administradores contactarán con las autoridades.

Se bloqueará a toda cuenta o dominio que comparta enlaces o material multimedia violento o que promueva la violencia. Los administradores se reservan el derecho a informar a las autoridades en caso de que encuentren indicios de actividad delictiva.

Queda prohibido el acoso a usuarios, usuarias y usuaries en todas sus formas, incluyendo el acoso sexual, sealioning, flaming, doxxing, bullying, joseo, subtooting, outing o suplantación de identidad entre otras formas de acoso.

Se bloqueará a toda cuenta o dominio que promueva conductas lesivas para la salud como el consumo y distribución de drogas, los trastornos de alimentación, las autolesiones, el suicidio, la ludopatía y la apología de conductas dañinas para la salud física y mental de la persona en general.

Queda terminantemente prohibida la distribución de textos, enlaces o material multimedia donde se incluya o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores, reales o figurados. Los administradores de Paquita podrán contactar con las autoridades en caso de que detecten posible actividad delictiva.

Paquita es una instancia libre de pornografía. No se permite a usuarios, usuarias o usuaries, trabajadores sexuales o no, que distribuyan repetidamente enlaces o material multimedia donde se muestre actividad sexual o fluidos corporales, aunque se haga catalogando el material como sensible y #NSFW.

Compartir material multimedia o enlaces sobre desnudez está permitido, siempre que sean desnudos propios de la persona que sube el material, sin involucrar a terceros, y que se catalogue como material sensible y se incluya advertencia o CW sobre este contenido, con las etiquetas #NSFW y #Nudity.

Se puede compartir ocasionalmente el propio trabajo o el de otras personas, pero no está permitido el marketing agresivo, el spam o publicitar productos y servicios si se recibe un pago o recompensa sustancial por ello.
Se considera recompensa sustancial cualquier regalo al usuario por un valor superior a 20€. El beneficio propio por compartir cualquier enlace promocional ha de ser debidamente advertido.
Se bloqueará a usuarios y dominios que compartan repetidamente bulos (especialmente bulos políticos, científicos o sanitarios) o teorías conspirativas tales como la Teoría del Reemplazo.

Queda terminantemente prohibido promocionar o distribuir contenidos relacionados con las criptomonedas, esquemas Ponzi o de economía piramidal, juegos de azar, apuestas de cualquier tipo, loot boxes o consejos de trading tanto en mercados regulados como no regulados.
Se prohíbe la difusión de material multimedia o enlaces que muestren a personas en estado de embriaguez o bajo el efecto del abuso de drogas, tanto legales como ilegales.

Podrá mostrarse material audiovisual de alcohol y tabaco siempre con content warning y en un contexto de moderación. Se prohíben los enlaces para comprar o promocionar alcohol o tabaco en cualquier circunstancia.

Queda prohibida la difusión o promoción de textos, enlaces o material audiovisual acerca de las llamadas “bebidas energéticas” con alto contenido en cafeína, cuyo marketing está dirigido específicamente a menores, especialmente vulnerables.
Está terminantemente prohibida la difusión de material audiovisual o enlaces que muestren drogas ilegales o de venta muy restringida, como la marihuana.

Se prohíbe aconsejar la toma de cualquier medicamento, requiera este o no prescripción médica. Si una persona solicita consejo médico y alguien habilitado para ello quiere dárselo, deberá ser estrictamente en privado.

En Paquita se interpretará la insistencia en dar consejos sobre dieta, estilo de vida y salud a una persona que no los ha solicitado como una forma de acoso. Intentar avergonzar a una persona por su cuerpo o aspecto físico supone expulsión inmediata.

La legislación aplicable en la instancia Paquita es la del estado de España. Asimismo, no se permitirá ningún contenido ilegal en Alemania. Paquita se adhiere activamente a los principios de la Declaración Universal de los Derechos Humanos y la Convención de Derechos del Niño.

En semejanza al concepto jurídico de "buena fe", Paquita espera que sus usuarios se atendrán en todo momento al espíritu de la normativa aquí esbozada y no intentarán aprovechar detalles formales de la redacción de las normas en su beneficio.

rules.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).

Les contenus pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés.

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes.
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux. Cela concerne aussi toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés).

rules.text: No bigotry, discrimination, or hatespeech. Race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, nationality, ethnicity, culture, etc. This instance is inclusive.
No trolling, doxing, or flamewars.
No "sex work." Commissioned art is fine.
No spam.
Self-promotion and spam accounts will be banned immediately. Some minor activity, like for independent artists or non-profits, is permissible.
Bots are allowed, but they may be muted from the public feed if they post excessively or come across as promotional.
NSFW content must be marked. This includes content containing nudity, excess profanity, or extremely graphic imagery.
Spoilers must be marked.
Be mindful of copyright and fair use when posting content. Flagrant violations will be removed.
Trigger warnings are permitted, but be aware that they are a bad idea. https://www.psychologytoday.com/blog/talking-about-men/201703/trigger-warnings-and-mental-health-where-is-the-evidence
Be careful with how much you reveal about your identity.
Follow Wheaton's Law. http://www.wheatonslaw.com/

rules.text:
No discrimination against marginalized groups, based on:
ethnicity, gender identity or expression, sexual identity or expression, physical characteristics or age, disability or illness, nationality, residency, citizen status, wealth or education, religious affiliation, agnosticism or atheism
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Estonia/Europe will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

English preferred. Minecraft is a global community and English is the language that enables the most members to communicate with one another. This also allows us to keep the instance safe and enjoyable.
The contents of this instance should remain primarily about Minecraft. This includes all Minecraft related games created by Mojang Studios.

rules.text: Content warnings required. Use common sense with Content Warnings(CWs). Tag nudity, politics, violence, and kink content. Tag anything lewd, or inappropriate for an office environment, generally considered stuff the average person wouldn't wish to see at work.
Don't abuse crossposting. Crossposters from other services must be CW'd and set as unlisted.
Use image descriptions as much as you can.
Harassment and abusive behaviors are not allowed. This includes harassing other instances because you disagree with their policies

We have a zero tolerance policy for racism, sexism, homophobia, promotion of right wing/nazi ideology, transphobia, ableism, animal abuse. We reserve the right to expand this list at moderator discretion for topics we may have missed.

No advertising This means no accounts on behalf or brands, or accounts representing organizations and/or for the purpose of advertisement allowed. Exceptions: personal accounts promoting artistic services like commissions.

You must be at least 18 years of age to register. Although we aren't an adult-oriented instance, we do federate with instances which are, and we cannot guarantee the timeline to be suitable for minors.

instance.title: Mastodon - Augsburg.social
instance.shortDescription: Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg in's Fediverse finden kannst. Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.
instance.description:
Augsburg.Social im Fediverse


Hier ist alles kostenlos und ohne Werbung! Hier stecken keine Konzerne dahinter die sich an Deinen Daten bereichern wollen!

Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg in's Fediverse finden kannst.
Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.

Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfacher gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollständige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer Löschung von Toots und zu einer Blockierung von Accounts führen können, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:

Belästigung, Stalking, Doxxing
Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Befürwortung
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Befürwortung
Gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder übermäßige Werbung
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Alle Nachrichten die über diesen Dienst verschickt werden, dürfen weder gegen geltendes deutsches noch internationales Recht verstoßen.
Dieser Dienst dient nicht zur Verbreitung von Inhalten, Dateien und/oder Angeboten, die gegen deutsches und/oder internationales Recht verstoßen.
Das Versenden von Werbung oder gleich welcher Art über diesen Dienst ist untersagt.
Die Verbreitung und/oder Unterstützung rassistischer, sexistischer, nationalsozialistischer, antidemokratischer, unmenschlicher, homophober oder extremistischer Inhalte sind untersagt.
Verstöße gegen die Nutzungsbedingungen führen zum Ausschluss (Löschung des Kontos).

Bitte melde Verhalten, das dich stört an admin@augsburg.social. Das schließt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit anderen Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social, verfügbar in deren Github-Repository.

Augsburg.Social wird rein privat in der Freizeit betrieben.
Wir erwirken keinerlei Einnahmen und Gewinn mit dem Angebot und finanzieren es aus eigener Hand.
Dadurch behalten wir uns natürlich vor die angebotenen Dienste jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen Gründen einzuschränken oder zur Not ganz abzuschalten.
Wir werden uns jedoch bemühen Euch frühzeitig zu informieren falls soetwas eintreten sollte.

Falls ihr Fragen oder Probleme habt wendet Euch gern direkt auf Mastodon an @AnID@augsburg.social oder per E-Mail an admin@augsburg.social


Der Betrieb kostet viel Geld und Zeit. Strom und Hardwarekosten sind nicht gerade wenig... Wenn Ihr mich und diesen Dienst unterstützen wollt dann könnt Ihr sehr gerne etwas spenden um beizutragen, dass dieser Dienst auch noch lange online bleibt.

rules.text: Racism, homophobia, antisemitism, transphobia, classism against the working class, ableism, exclusionary behavior, misogyny, genocide denial, harassment, Islamophobia, and other similar hate is not permitted. I will personally blast you into the sun.
Use content warnings for various topics, such as sexual content, mental health, food, and other touchy topics at your own discretion. If a content warning is required, the admins will let you know.
Don't advertise or spam. Asking for money is alright, but this is not a space to solely sell a product without somehow being tied to a user.
As a general rule of thumb, images should be captioned. If you are for whatever reason unable to caption an image, please add the content warning "uncaptioned image" or something akin.

Illegal content is not allowed. Despite the knowledge that some laws are unjust, types.pl does not endorse illegal action. This specifically lies under the jurisdiction of the United States, as that is where the servers are located.
If you are using a Twitter crossposter, you should be posting content on Mastodon as well. If the large majority of your posts are Twitter crossposts, you will be banned.
Administrators reserve the right to defederate with instances or boot users off the instance at their will for any reason.

rules.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, transfeindliche, ableistische, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

rules.text: Rule #1 – No illegal content or conduct. Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.
Rule #2 – Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.
Rule #3 – Don’t stalk or harass other users. Respect other users of our service and other federated instances.

Rule #4 – Misinformation and deceptive content is prohibited. Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we don’t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.
Rule #5 – Content warnings (CW) are required for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions.
Rule #5.2 – Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.
Rule #6 – Respect the service. Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome.
Rule #7 – Use the report system. If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging.

Rule #8.1 – Account / post language identification. We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to “CW” (Content Warning).

Rule #8.2 – Misleading or deceptive impersonation. You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

Rule #8.3 – Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using “Unlisted”, “Followers only”, or “Mentioned people only”, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

Rule #8.4 – No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules.
Rule #8.5 – If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.
Rule #8.6 – All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).
The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko – Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

rules.text:
Be good and kind to each other.
Give people's music a try.  You don't have to like it, but you also don't have to tell everyone you don't like it either.
Polite disagreements are fine but being rude will get you banned.
Invalidating someone else's music preferences, except for intolerant types of music (hate music etc) will earn a ban.
No advertisements except of musical bands or acts and related ads.  "My band is on tour" is fine.  "My cryptocurrency ad has music!" is not fine.
Links to illegal content are banned, especially music downloads you don't permission to distribute.
NSFW content without tagging will get you banned.
No spam.
If you're looking for Mastodon that rock / metal band, they're over at @mastodonmusic@mastodon.social (they're welcome to be here too but wow, epic namespace crossover).
No posting other artist's work without credit AND analysis/opinion.
No racism, sexism, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above.
Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed.

No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (this includes loli), content illegal in Germany and/or France and/or United States, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism, conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
No NFT content. None at all. There are crypto-related instances on the fediverse that would be more suitable.

Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics, AND hide them under a Content Warning (CW).  Weird that this might happen on a music instance, but yet here we are...
Mastodon Music has a zero-tolerance mandate for harassment or bullying — your account will be immediately suspended.

No unapproved bots, advertising, or spam.  One big exception is direct posts by musicians about their music and concerts.  For now there's no rule on corporate posts, but if things get noisy and less-useful, we'll reword this to exclude excessive-profit-generating posts.

Prefer music purchase links over streaming links.  
(This isn't a hard and enforced rule, but musicians need everyone's support.  In other words, post Bandcamp or Store links at the top, and Spotify / YT Music links in the reply or comment whenever possible.)

rules.text: Discrimination, especially against minorities, is strongly discouraged. This includes, but is not limited to: Racism, xenophobia. Homophobia, transphobia, and other queerphobia. Classism. Gatekeeping the "queer" status (acephobia, etc.)
"Punching up" does not fall under the guideline above, and is allowed.

Usage of right-wing figures of speech are strongly discouraged. Please keep yourselves up-to-date on the dog whistles that are going around. Of course, this point will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis, as right-wing dog whistles are created to intentionally hijack everyday jokes and signs.

Advertising is strongly discouraged. Fund raisers, users of the site selling their own products or advertising their services are fine - we absolutely do not want corporations to advertise on here, however.

Posting media without media descriptions, also known as alt text, is strongly discouraged. We encourage you to enable the popups that warn you if you are about to toot or boost content that does not follow this guideline.
Don't spam. Of course, some jokes are mostly repetitive (common "fedi bits"), but use common sense on where to draw the line. If the local timeline contains just your toots, you're taking it too far.

Do not interpret these guidelines in bad faith, not even for "playing the devil's advocate". We are trying to foster a progressive community - if you have an issue with the guidelines, feel free to discuss it.

You must use content warnings for content. This includes obvious topics such as sexual content, assault, mental health issues, but also less obvious ones like food, selfies, pictures with eye contact to the viewer, etc. Even if you may not find topics triggering at all, this helps.
Any content illegal in Germany will be removed. We want this site to stay online, and as such, we have to follow laws in addition to our own morals.

rules.text: No commercial accounts, advertising, or excessive promotion.

No stalking or harassment.
No fake accounts unless they are clearly labeled as such.
Don't make us make a new rule. If the defense of an action is that it's not specifically outlined as against these rules, consider instead this rule.
Treat each other the way you would like to be treated and respect the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (https://www.un.org/en/about-us/universal-declaration-of-human-rights)

rules.text: Be kind and respectful of others. This includes respecting things like pronouns, using content warnings as appropriate, etc.
Don't post anything illegal (duh).
Don't post anything designed to shock or disgust people.
This is not a NSFW server. I don't particularly care about the occasional not-quite-SFW post. I'm not puritan. But just don't make your account all about NSFW content. That's all!

Disagreement is fine, other opinions are welcome. Keep your discussion and disagreement civil and try to avoid ad hominems. If you venture into areas of denying other people's human rights, you'll find that you'll lose your rights to post here pretty darn quickly.
No threats of violence, etc.

I'll do my best to use a three-strike system and reach out regarding moderation decisions. But at the end of the day, this is not Elon's "public square". I don't owe you free speech. You can host your own Mastodon server if you want. I can, and will, make any moderation decision I feel is necessary.

instance.title: Mastodon.IM
instance.shortDescription: 欢迎来到 Mastodon.im！这是一个泛话题中文实例。本站使用 Mastodon glitch-soc 分支运行，由 O3O.Foundation 运营。
instance.description: 欢迎来到 Mastodon.im！我们欢迎任何热情、友好、乐于分享的朋友们加入。请遵循互相尊重的原则，并遵守本站的《主题或发言规则》。 本站点基于开源软件长毛象（Mastodon）建立。不同于微博或 Twitter，这是一个开源的去中心化社交网络。去中心化设计防止社交数据被利益集团垄断，也增加了屏蔽审查的难度。整个长毛象网络由上千个实例组成，这些实例相互连接，最终形成了一个庞大的网络，就像是一个巨大宇宙。每一个服务器都是宇宙中的一个星系，用户就是每个星系里的行星。你可以随时导出自己的账户并转移到其他实例中，无需担心因为实例运营者的问题导致的数据丢失。 请参阅《长毛象中文用户使用文档》了解如何使用长毛象。

fields.name: 捐助本站
fields.value: https://o3o.foundation/donate

rules.text: 【用户交流】禁止发布对性取向、性癖、爱好、信仰、宗教、政治立场、民族、地域等的侮辱性言论
【用户交流】禁止对任何用户发送具有骚扰、猥亵、恐吓、威胁、诱骗、霸凌性质的内容、不受欢迎的性暗示内容，或其他令他人感到不安或不适、打扰他人正常生活的内容
【敏感内容】只要涉及成人内容，包括文字及媒体，均需使用恰当的CW标签及隐藏内容警告
【敏感内容】请不要发布违反伦理及社会共识的成人内容，如由真实的儿童参与制作的色情内容
【使用行为】禁止对其他用户实施任何人肉行为
【使用行为】禁止使用包括但不限于任何形式的自动化程序等手段大量获取本站的数据
【使用行为】机器人账户不得滥用服务器资源
【使用行为】禁止冒用他人身份注册账号或发布冒用他人身份的嘟文

rules.text: Don't be a dick.

Don't do anything patently illegal, likely to get the instance/admins sued, attract the attention of any TLAs, etc.
Admins have the final say in all matters involving this instance you're welcome to talk about and advocate for democracy but this instance is not one.
Opinions of individual users of this instance do not necessarily represent those of the Admins and/or maintainers of this instance or any entity other than the user from which the originated.

This is a safe liberally aligned space. If you think that Donald Trump, Ron DeSantis, Greg Abbot, Ted Cruz, Josh Hawley,  MGT...you should be getting the point by now...are the hero of any story there's a Mastodon instance for you! It's called Truth Social.
Randos need not apply.
No soliciting, proselytizing. Be passionate about your passions but not everyone is a potential convert to your cause respect them if they ask you to move on.

rules.text: No se permitirán actitudes, violentas, amenazantes, abusivas, discriminatorias, que pongan en riesgo los derechos y deberes de las personas, que atenten contra la privacidad, o que justifiquen atrocidades.
Los usuarios de La Terracita podrán acordar actitudes no permitidas no contempladas en la lista anterior.

Las medidas a tomar en caso de infracción pueden ir desde el apercibimiento, la suspensión temporal, la suspensión permanente, la notificación a las instancias de origen, o el bloqueo a nivel de instancia llegado el caso.
La Terracita anuncia su compromiso con el covenant de Mastodon (https://joinmastodon.org/covenant) en todos sus puntos.

Es la intención de La Terracita de mantener unas buenas prácticas de moderación y transparencia siguiendo los Principios de Santa Clara (https://santaclaraprinciples.org/), en la medida de lo posible y adaptados a la naturaleza no-corporativa sin ánimo de lucro de La Terracita.
El contenido publicado en La Terracita deberá cumplir la legislación vigente española, incluyendo la RGPD.

Como en cualquier instancia de Mastodon, los mensajes privados no están protegidos por cifrado. Los administradores de La Terracita se comprometen a proteger la confidencialidad, integridad y disponibilidad de las conversaciones públicas y privadas, dentro del marco de la legislación vigente.
Sólo se proporcionará acceso al contenido o metadatos de conversaciones no públicas en presencia de una orden judicial.
La Terracita, a día de hoy, no ha recibido ningún requerimiento u orden judicial de ningún tipo.
La Terracita se reserva el derecho de modificar y/o desarrollar estas normas cuando sea necesario.

사전에 승낙을 득 하지 않은 상업적 광고는 스팸으로 간주합니다. 사전 승낙은 @kurry 로 Direct 툿 부탁드립니다.
성소수자 혐오/나치/인종차별 등은 절대로 허용되지 않습니다.

"이상한 짓"을 하지 말아주세요!
(다음 것들이 포함 - 그러나 국한되지 않은)되어 있습니다: 의도적인 분쟁 유발, 다른 커뮤니티의 논쟁을 끌고 오는 것 등등
실사 NSFW 등(한국 법에 위배되는 경우)은 이 서버에서 이용하실 수 없습니다.
특정 문화를 강요하거나, 행동을 강요하지 마세요. 단, 서버 규칙 및 기타 관련 법규는 준수하셔야 합니다.
본 서버는 “퍼리 특화” 서버입니다. (5531) 서버를 제대로 들어왔는지 확인해 주신 후 가입 절차를 진행해 주세요.

rules.text: Don't be a dick. If you screw up and get called out on it, apologize and move on, and try to learn from it. This one is vague, but as the Supreme Court said, "I know it when I see it." Similarly, try not to take deep offense easily. Reasonable people can disagree without violating this rule.
No spam or advertising. You may promote yourself and causes you care about, but keep it reasonable.

Please make use of content warnings (CW's) where appropriate. Things that should definitely get CWs (but not limited to): violence, trauma, imagery associated with those. Things you can CW (but shouldn't feel pressured to): politics, media, sports?
Absolutely no: bigotry; racism; misogyny; xenophobia; discrimination on the basis of race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, gender, sexual preferences, body type.  (See Rule 1)
No advocacy of violence or inciting violence, including harassment. This one will get you banned quickly.
No commercial bots, follow bots, or any bots that annoy the admins of this instance. If you want to point a bot at us, please make it useful or something that elevates discourse.
No stalking or harassment.

Represent Austin well when interacting with the rest of the fediverse. If we get legitimate complaints about a user here from another admin, we will most likely take action to avoid being defederated.

rules.text: No trolling, microaggressions, bullying, doxxing, or harassment.
Respect others' boundaries.

Use the Content Warning feature liberally.  Tag sensitive content such as violence/blood, NSFW content, and other potentially upsetting or triggering topics.  If you have to ask yourself, err on the side of requiring an extra click.
Posting the same content on multiple instances in order to spam local and/or federated timelines is not permitted.
No content that includes sexual depictions of minors (including illustrations).
No content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism.  No conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

Conduct intended to stalk or harass users, impede users from using the service, degrade the performance of the service, or incite others to perform any of the aforementioned actions is disallowed and will result in a permanent ban.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia, casteism, and/or violent nationalism or the advocacy of any of the above.
No unapproved advertising or spam.
Bots must be approved by the administrators and are subject to all rules above.
Provably false content is subject to removal by the administrators.  Repeated posting of disinformation or intentional misinformation will result in a permanent ban.
In plain English: Be excellent to each other.  Don't be Nazis.  Respect boundaries.

Hi! This is Suryo!

This is a personal instance and I intend to use it only for my own learning, research, understanding of the fediverse, and for some friends. The amount of resources I have at my disposal for this is very low and I will not be able to support many users at the moment. Sorry about that :(

That is why I intend to keep it small. In the future, if and when I am able to afford more resources, I might make this instance public or create another instance.

contactAccount.note:
IoT researcher. Amateur musician. Bad gamer. I own the instance megalodon.social

My name is Suryoday Basak and I'm a PhD candidate at Penn State, Computer Science and Engineering. My focus is on an overlap of wireless sensing, machine learning and security of upcoming wireless technologies. Some relevant topics could be: #wirelesssniffing #wirelesshacking #sensors

Other than that, I'm interested in a variety of topics in science, tech, and DIY, and I play the guitar in my spare time.

rules.text:
Do:
Using welcoming and inclusive language.
Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences.
Gracefully accepting constructive criticism.
Focusing on what is best for the community.
Showing empathy towards other community members.

Do not post:
Sexualised language/imagery/unwelcome sexual attention or advances.
Personal/political attacks inclusive of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia.
Publishing others’ private information.
Publish any illegal content in the UK.
Incitement of violence/violent ideologies

Commercial:
Company accounts are welcome but advertising is not permitted on this server. Over promotion, bot like behaviour replying to users, etc. will not be tolerated.

Public interest accounts:
Use of accounts for public figures is encouraged however, we ask you interact with comments and the community and not use your account as a notice board or press release hub by ignoring comments/interactions with other users.

** You must **
Have a link to the IoW (UK) and state how in the signup process.
Requests with no link stated in the "Why do you want to join" will be rejected.

No shortened links, e.g. bit.ly, t.ly, goo.gl, ift.tt, lnkd.in, is.gd or t.co (These are malicious because link-shorteners track users without their consent and obscure the destination address, which also prevents users from being able to decide whether they want to visit the link beforehand).

We strongly discourage posting un-described images or video on Public privacy setting.
No cross-post only accounts from Twitter, RSS on Public privacy setting.

rules.text: Las cuentas que no cumplan mayoritariamente con la temática de la instancia podrían ser suspendidas.
La pornografia infantil, lolicon, incitación a la violencia o promoción de ideologias violentas, está prohibida.
Prohibido el contenido ilegal bajo las leyes españolas.
Cada usuario es dueño de sus comentarios. Esta instancia de Mastodon, no se responsabiliza de los comentarios de sus usuarios.
No cuentas centradas en activismo reivindicativo ni en la política institucional.

Esta instancia no acepta ningún tipo de comportamiento que atente contra la dignidad de las personas, por su raza, sexo, orientación sexual, identidad de género, situación personal o riesgo de exclusión social.
Por favor, evita publicar bulos intencionadamente.

El contenido para adultos (desnudos, pornografía, violencia o gore) está restringido a creaciones artísticas (FanArts, ilustraciones, dibujos...) siempre que coincida con la temática de la instancia y debe incluir siempre etiqueta CW. Las cuentas de autopromoción para adultos están prohibidas.

Las cuentas fantasma que usan el crossposting entre redes sociales con fines de respaldo y no interactuan con sus seguidores están prohibidas. Nos reservamos el derecho de suspender cuentas que consideremos que abusan del mismo.

Están prohibidas las cuentas de SPAM, Phishing, o centradas en la promoción de criptoactivos de dudosa procedencia o cualquier otra actividad que pueda ocasionar daños economicos a los miembros de la comunidad.
